db:abstract.db:para: The QCameraExposure class provides interface for exposure related camera settings.

db:td.db:para: Use larger aperture with small depth of field.
The base value for device specific exposure modes.

db:section.db:title: enum QCameraExposure::FlashMode

db:td.db:para: Constant light source. If supported, torch can be enabled without loading the camera.
Constant light source, useful for video capture. The light is turned on only while camera is active.
Use the flash in conjunction with a slow shutter speed. This mode allows better exposure of distant objects and/or motion blur effect.
The similar mode to FlashSlowSyncFrontCurtain but flash is fired at the end of exposure.

db:section.db:para: The FlashModes type is a typedef for QFlags<FlashMode>. It stores an OR combination of FlashMode values.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] aperture : const qreal
db:section.db:para: Lens aperture is specified as an F number, the ratio of the focal length to effective aperture diameter.

db:section.db:title: exposureCompensation : qreal
db:section.db:para: Exposure compensation in EV units.
Exposure compensation property allows to adjust the automatically calculated exposure.

db:section.db:title: exposureMode : QCameraExposure::ExposureMode
db:section.db:para: This property holds the exposure mode being used.

db:section.db:title: flashMode : QCameraExposure::FlashModes
db:section.db:para: This property holds the flash mode being used.
Usually the single QCameraExposure::FlashMode flag is used, but some non conflicting flags combination are also allowed, like QCameraExposure::FlashManual | QCameraExposure::FlashSlowSyncRearCurtain.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] flashReady : const bool
db:section.db:para: Indicates if the flash is charged and ready to use.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] isoSensitivity : const int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the sensor ISO sensitivity.

db:section.db:title: meteringMode : QCameraExposure::MeteringMode
db:section.db:para: This property holds the metering mode being used.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] shutterSpeed : const qreal
db:section.db:para: Camera's shutter speed in seconds.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::apertureChanged(qreal value)
db:section.db:para: Signal emitted when aperature changes to value.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::apertureRangeChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signal emitted when aperature range has changed.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::exposureCompensationChanged(qreal value)
db:section.db:para: Signal emitted when the exposure compensation changes to value.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::flashReady(bool ready)
db:section.db:para: Signal the flash ready status has changed.

db:section.db:title: bool QCameraExposure::isAvailable() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if exposure settings are supported by this camera.

db:section.db:title: bool QCameraExposure::isExposureModeSupported(QCameraExposure::ExposureMode mode) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the exposure mode is supported.

db:section.db:title: bool QCameraExposure::isFlashModeSupported(QCameraExposure::FlashModes mode) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the flash mode is supported.

db:section.db:title: bool QCameraExposure::isFlashReady() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if flash is charged.

db:section.db:title: bool QCameraExposure::isMeteringModeSupported(QCameraExposure::MeteringMode mode) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the metering mode is supported.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::isoSensitivityChanged(int value)
db:section.db:para: Signal emitted when sensitivity changes to value.

db:section.db:title: qreal QCameraExposure::requestedAperture() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the requested manual aperture or -1.0 if automatic aperture is turned on.

db:section.db:title: int QCameraExposure::requestedIsoSensitivity() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the requested ISO sensitivity or -1 if automatic ISO is turned on.

db:section.db:title: qreal QCameraExposure::requestedShutterSpeed() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the requested manual shutter speed in seconds or -1.0 if automatic shutter speed is turned on.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::setAutoAperture()
db:section.db:para: Turn on auto aperture

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::setAutoIsoSensitivity()
db:section.db:para: Turn on auto sensitivity

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::setAutoShutterSpeed()
db:section.db:para: Turn on auto shutter speed

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::setManualAperture(qreal aperture)
db:section.db:para: Sets the manual camera aperture value.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::setManualIsoSensitivity(int iso)
db:section.db:para: Sets the manual sensitivity to iso

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::setManualShutterSpeed(qreal seconds)
db:section.db:para: Set the manual shutter speed to seconds

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::setSpotMeteringPoint(const QPointF &point)
db:section.db:para: Allows setting the spot metering point to point.

db:section.db:title: qreal QCameraExposure::shutterSpeed() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the current shutter speed in seconds.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::shutterSpeedChanged(qreal speed)
db:section.db:para: Signals that a camera's shutter speed has changed.

db:section.db:title: void QCameraExposure::shutterSpeedRangeChanged()
db:section.db:para: Signal emitted when the shutter speed range has changed.

db:section.db:title: QPointF QCameraExposure::spotMeteringPoint() const
db:section.db:para: When supported, the spot metering point is the (normalized) position of the point of the image where exposure metering will be performed. This is typically used to indicate an "interesting" area of the image that should be exposed properly.
The coordinates are relative frame coordinates: QPointF(0,0) points to the left top frame point, QPointF(0.5,0.5) points to the frame center, which is typically the default spot metering point.
The spot metering point is only used with spot metering mode.

db:section.db:title: QList<qreal> QCameraExposure::supportedApertures(bool *continuous = nullptr) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of aperture values camera supports. The apertures list can change depending on the focal length, in such a case the apertureRangeChanged() signal is emitted.
If the camera supports arbitrary aperture values within the supported range, *continuous is set to true, otherwise *continuous is set to false.

db:section.db:title: QList<int> QCameraExposure::supportedIsoSensitivities(bool *continuous = nullptr) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of ISO senitivities camera supports.
If the camera supports arbitrary ISO sensitivities within the supported range, *continuous is set to true, otherwise *continuous is set to false.

db:section.db:title: QList<qreal> QCameraExposure::supportedShutterSpeeds(bool *continuous = nullptr) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of shutter speed values in seconds camera supports.
If the camera supports arbitrary shutter speed values within the supported range, *continuous is set to true, otherwise *continuous is set to false.
